text: Mariscos y comida estilo sinaloa...los mejores en las vegas puro marisco fresco y preparado de la mejor manera para gusto y deleite de la gente que sabe disfrutar del mejor marisco 100% sinaloense
I will definitely come back here the vibe is amazing good music the best mariscos i have ever try here in vegas the best micheladas exelent service ill come back for sure
I come here regularly, and this place has never disappointed. The Mar y Tierra molcajete is a must try!! The ceviche is great, and you can't forget the micheladas
I wasn't the biggest fan of this place. Food is okay but not the best. There's definitely better Mariscos in Vegas
